title: An intro to Posts
content:
The new posts tab you're seeing is specifically for me directly communicating with the user.
Most things I will post are just updates to the biome data or aura data, but sometimes I'll post important information, so keep an eye out on this tab!
You'll also receive a notification whenever a new post is sent out. But don't worry, these notifications are NOT intrusive and wont be that annoying.

Anyways, this post is quite old since this is when I first made the system. Have fun and thanks for using Oyster Detector!
